wikipedia_page.main: Adam Frost (born 21 August 1972) is a British author, best known for his children's books Ralph the Magic Rabbit (shortlisted for the Waterstones Children's Book Prize) and The Epic Book of Epicness (winner of the Blue Peter Book Award). He also designs information graphics for The Guardian, and teaches and writes on the subject.
